title: gomobile init fails rename on windows
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
1.6.1

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
WIndows 10 64 bit

After grabbing gomobile as per wiki, I ran gomobile init.  Seemed to freeze but noticed that after I pressed enter, i recved this message:

PS C:\cygwin64\home\peterpan\Projects\GoProjects\src> ../bin/gomobile init
C:\cygwin64\home\peterpan\Projects\GoProjects\bin\gomobile.exe: rename C:\cygwin64\home\peterpan\Projects\GoProjects\pkg
\gomobile\work-307124643\android-ndk-r12\toolchains\llvm\prebuilt\windows-x86_64\bin\clang C:\cygwin64\home\peterpan\Projects\GoProjects\pkg\gomobile\android-ndk-r12\llvm\bin\clang: The system cannot find the file specified.


I have cygwin installed but I was not using cygwin, only windows powershell

I tried several times, even wiping my entire src, pkg and bin folders with the same results.
